title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: mercerized cotton embroidery, linen foundation 
Technique: plain weave foundation with withdrawn element work and cut work; overcast and looping stitches used to create pattern, raised satin stitch for the numbers
description: Sample cloth to take embroidery orders for linens.  Thirty-seven different patterns of withdrawn and deflected element work, each identified with an embroidered number, arranged in a vertical rectangle.
name: Sampler
